properties.value: The Diamond ring is made by using a gold bar, a cut diamond and a ring mould on a furnace. Making it requires a Crafting level of 43, and gives 85 experience.

Item ID1643

The Diamond ring is made by using a gold bar, a cut diamond and a ring mould on a furnace. Making it requires a Crafting level of 43, and gives 85 experience.

The diamond ring can be enchanted into a ring of life by members through the use of the Lvl-4 Enchant spell.
